1562570.name: Lotus Bloom Soundtrack
1562570.description:
Lotus Bloom (Original Soundtrack) was composed thinking about a mediation experience.

Each note was given equal importance as well as the silence between them.

The instrumentation is inspired by chamber music (even tough it was all made using VSTs): piano, flutes, violin and cello. Together with this soundtrack comes musical scores of all the 3 tracks and a booklet with haiku written specifically for the game by the composer.

Soundtrack comes in mp3 and WAV format, musical scores and haikus comes in PDF format.
